data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: One could combine the two protocols to form a powerful third, mastering both cable and wireless transmission, but a different super-protocol would be needed for each possible combination of protocols. It ____ easier ____ leave ____ base ____ alone, and ____ a ____ that ____ work ____ top ____ any ____ them ( the Internet Protocol ____ an ____. ) This ____ make ____ stacks ____ two ____ each. The inter-network protocol will communicate with each of the base protocol in their simpler language; the base protocols will not talk directly to each other.
data.partBlankContent: One could combine the two protocols to form a powerful third, mastering both cable and wireless transmission, but a different super-protocol would be needed for each possible combination of protocols. It i_ easier t_ leave t__ base prot_____ alone, and des___ a prot____ that c__ work o_ top o_ any o_ them ( the Internet Protocol i_ an exa____. ) This wi__ make t__ stacks o_ two prot_____ each. The inter-network protocol will communicate with each of the base protocol in their simpler language; the base protocols will not talk directly to each other.
data.answer: 人们可以将这两个协议结合起来，形成一个强大的第三个协议，同时掌握电缆和无线传输，但每种可能的协议组合都需要一个不同的超级协议。撇开_基协议不谈，设计一个可以在它们之上工作的协议(Internet协议就是一个例子)是很容易的。这将形成两个栈，每个栈由两个协议组成。网络间协议将以各自较简单的语言与每个基本协议通信;基本协议之间不会直接对话。
